metaTitle: TTS Scriptor | Bring Your Stories to Life
metaDescription: Instantly convert your scripts into captivating multi-voice audio with AI. Perfect for writers, content creators, and storytellers. Start for free using Azure and Google's free tiers.
heroTitle: Transform Your Scripts into Captivating Audio
heroSubtitle: Convert text into multi-voice narrations using AI. Get started for free by leveraging the monthly quotas from Azure and Google.
featuresSubtitle: Advantages that will revolutionize the way you create.
feature1Desc: Paste your raw text and let our AI structure it automatically, identifying the narrator and characters.
feature2Desc: Access premium voices from Azure and Google with no initial cost. Assign a unique voice, style, and emotion to each character.
feature3Desc: Adjust timings, add background music or sound effects in our multitrack editor, and export your final masterpiece.
freeTiersDesc: TTS Scriptor integrates with your own Azure and Google Cloud API keys. By using their generous monthly free tiers, you can synthesize hundreds of thousands of characters without spending a dime. Enough for several chapters or even a short book every month!
freeTiersYouControl: You are in full control of your costs.
step1Desc: Write your script or let our AI format it for you.
step2Desc: Choose the perfect voice and style for each character.
step3Desc: Generate the audio, fine-tune it in the studio, and download the final file.
finalCtaTitle: Ready to give voice to your ideas?
finalCtaSubtitle: Start creating your audio narrations today.
